description: ffDiaporama its a must in my system. I'm using the appimage version of it since the Snap one keeps giving me an audio error. Did "Configure permissions" as per Gerard suggestion but I can't figure out what it needs to be done.
Works much like Roxio with all the necessary features needed to produce a sharp video presentation.
summary: Simple and easy to use yet full of features

description: Amzaing Slideshow tool, I have posted over 40 videos on Youtube using ffDiaporama, it is very stable, easy to use and very powerful. Unfortunatly it appers is not been maintaned any longer but still the best in Linux

If you get a message on startup about the audio configuration not being right, and subsequent crash, the button on this page called "Configure permissions..." is the one to click. I thoroughly enjoy using ffDiaporama and have used it over many years. Thanks for putting it back here in the repository. It is an old favourite.
über System - Enstellungen - Programme - FFDIAPORAMA die fehlenden Einstellungen (ausgegraut) aktivieren. Dann läuft das Programm

Dès que je le lance, j'ai ce message d'erreur:
«Error during initialisation of sound system. Check your configuration and try again»

Quelle configuration? Qu'est-ce qu'il a, mon sound system?

Essayé sur deux ordinateurs différents. Ubuntiu version 22.04
